clinical_study.brief_title: Small Doses of Dexmedetomidine for Emergence Agitation
clinical_study.official_title: Influence of Small Doses Dexmedetomidine to the Elderly Patients' Emergence Agitation

brief_summary.textblock: Dexmedetomidine Hydrochloride is a kind of high selectivity alpha 2 agonists adrenaline, can inhibit the activity of sympathetic nerve, and reduce the adverse effects of stress reaction in anesthesia recovery period.Literatures have been reported that Dex can reduce the rate of emergence agitation of children and adults,especially in elderly patients(>64 years) after using sevoflurane anesthesia.

primary_outcome.time_frame: the duration of PACU room stay,expect 30 minutes
primary_outcome.description: stay in the PACU room after operation,measure the score of Aono's four-point scale(AFPS) every two minutes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: the duration of PACU room stay,expect 30 minutes
primary_outcome.description: stay in the PACU room after operation,measure the score of numeric rating scale(NRS) every two minutes.

primary_outcome.time_frame: the duration of hospital stay,expect 5 weeks
primary_outcome.description: when stay in the hospital,measure the total doses of Nalbuphine and Fentanyl using

primary_outcome.time_frame: the duration of hospital stay,expect 5 weeks
primary_outcome.description: when stay in the hospital, measure the number of agitation.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to skin closure, up to 1 hour
secondary_outcome.description: measure the mean arterial pressure at 6 time points including after pump injection of Dexmedetomidine or normal saline 10 minutes, 20 minutes,30 minutes,before pulling out the endotracheal tube,at the time of pulling out the endotracheal tube,and after pulling out the endotracheal tube 5 minutes

secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the beginning of induction to skin closure, up to 1 hour

arm_group.description: inhale Sevoflurane + intravenous pumping Remifentanil 0.1µg/kg/min + intravenous inject cisatracurium besilate 0.08mg/kg in fixed time interval + finally add sufentanil 0.15µg/kg,and intravenous pumping Dexmedetomidine 0.2µg/kg/h.
